oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Henry Doubleday Research Association (HDRA): Laboratory
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Soil biology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: State of the art laboratories for research related to plant genetic resources, soils, seed pathology and microbiology (licensed by Defra to handle quarantine plant pathogens).
